main: Starts encounters with 0 {status:WornHeartGreg}. It passively increases by 1 every turn and increases by 3 when his defense is used.
All his skills give him 3 {status:BloodyHandGregFirst}. His S2 gives an additional 3 at less than 5 {status:WornHeartGreg} or up to 10 by consuming {status:BloodDinner} at 5+ stacks.

S3 consumes any {status:BloodyHandGregFirst} he has above 10, healing him per stack consumed. At 10 consumed, it gains Coin Power and at 20 consumed, it gains a Coin Reuse. The S3 also heals him based on the damage dealt regardless of consuming {status:BloodyHandGregFirst} and deals bonus damage based on missing HP.
other: {status:WornHeartGreg} gives him {status:DefenseUp} every turn and, at 40%- HP, it also gives him HP healing based on damage dealt. If his passive is active, he heals an ally's SP by 10-{status:WornHeartGreg} every turn.
At 10+ {status:BloodyHandGregFirst}, he gets {status:AttackUp} every turn, and at 20+, he gets an additional {status:AttackUp} and a free 1 {status:Burst} and {status:Laceration} application on hit.
His passive lets him ignore death once.
His defense gives him more {status:Laceration} and triggers it thrice to generate {status:BloodDinner}.

1121001.desc:
Turn End: heal ((10 - [WornHeartGreg])/2) SP for the ally with the least SP (excluding: self or allies that are Panicked or Corroded; rounded down)
In this Encounter, when this unit takes damage that brings their HP down to 0, nullify that damage; then, this unit's HP cannot drop below 1 for the turn. (once per Encounter)
1121001.name: Self-destructive Dedication

1121002.desc:
If this unit is on field, or is one of the units that can appear on this Stage, increase [BloodDinner] value by the amount of [Laceration] damage collectively received by every unit. 
When this unit enters the field, the sleeping blood drenching the battlefield will rise above the surface.
1121002.name: Bloodfeast

1121011.desc:
Turn End: heal (10 - [WornHeartGreg]) SP for the ally with the least SP (excluding: self or allies that are Panicked or Corroded)
In this Encounter, when this unit takes damage that brings their HP down to 0, nullify that damage; then, this unit's HP cannot drop below 1 for the turn. (once per Encounter)
1121011.name: Self-destructive Dedication

1121021.desc: 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage heals 3 HP On Hit (3 times per turn)
1121021.name: Don Quixote Hardblood Arts 6: Whip

1121031.desc:
1 ally with the lowest HP percentage heals 3 HP On Hit (3 times per turn)
- If the target hit by the said ally had [Laceration], heal 3 additional HP
1121031.name: Don Quixote Hardblood Arts 6: Whip

data.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 50% of the HP damage dealt (max 100 per Skill)
[WhenUse] Deal +1% damage for every 1% missing HP on self (max 60%)
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Consume every excess Stack of [BloodyHandGregFirst] past 10 Stack to gain the following effects:
- Heal (Stacks consumed x 3) HP on self
- If this unit consumed 10+ Stack, Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Gain 10 [Laceration]
[EndSkill] Heal 10% HP on self
data.name: The Unforgivable Sin

data.desc:
On Hit with this Skill: heal 50% of the HP damage dealt (max 100 per Skill)
[WhenUse] Deal +1.5% damage for every 1% missing HP on self (max 90%)
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Laceration], Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] Consume every excess Stack of [BloodyHandGregFirst] past 10 Stack to gain the following effects:
- Heal (Stacks consumed x 3) HP on self
- If this unit consumed 10+ Stack, Coin Power +1
- If this unit consumed 20 Stack, Reuse the final Coin
[WhenUse] Gain 10 [Laceration]
[EndSkill] Heal 10% HP on self
data.name: The Unforgivable Sin

data.desc:
[StartBattle] At 40%+ HP, gain 5 [Laceration] and activate [Laceration] up to 3 times on self (once per turn; lose [Laceration] Count equal to the number of times it was activated)
[StartBattle] At less than 40% HP, consume up to 20 [BloodDinner] and heal the same value as HP (once per turn)
[StartBattle] Gain 3 [WornHeartGreg] (once per turn)
data.name: Faded Patience
